replies.author: Jeffrey
replies.text: What is happening in Syria is astounding Riley . I feel horrible for the families living in the devastation that comes from civil war. I applaud the day America starts welcoming these families. However, I'm also aware of the multiple horrendous attacks Radical Islamist have executed across Europe. European countries are the unfortunate example of poor vetting policies and I believe Hillary turns a Blind eye to a majority of these facts and would in the long run endanger the national security of America and put everyday citizens at risk. Although I can't tell you Trump's vetting plan details. I can say that I'm happy he's willing to attempt to take a step in the right direction instead of ignoring it. More than that I believe it is not just America who should accept refugees. Why have the five richest Muslim countries in middle East not taken in refugees? They say it is for security reasons. I believe the smartest minds internationally should attempt to find a vetting solution and place these refugees in all nations including Egypt and Sadi Arabia
